original: la nyes byas re re'o //
analyzed: la nyes byas re re'o //

translated: If one is unable to understand the meaning of a laywoman, a woman, or a girl who is impaired, who does not speak the same language, who is asleep, or who is in meditative absorption, and so on, it is a misdeed.

original: rab tu byung ba mo dang / za ma dang / ma ning dang / mtshan gnyis pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba mo dang / za ma dang / ma ning dang / mtshan gnyis pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If the woman is a nun, a paṇḍaka, a neuter, or a hermaphrodite, it is a misdeed.

original: mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba mo don kun shes par nus pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba mo don kun shes par nus pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If the woman is a nonhuman, and one is able to understand the meaning, it is a misdeed.

original: mi nus pa la nyes byas na smad do //
analyzed: mi nus pa la nyes byas na smad do //
translated: If one is unable to understand the meaning, it is a slight misdeed.

original: dud 'gro mo don kun shes par nus pa dang mi nus pa gnyi ga la nyes byas na smad do //
analyzed: dud 'gro mo don kun shes par nus pa dang mi nus pa gnyi ga la nyes byas na smad do //
translated: If the woman is an animal, and one is able to understand the meaning, or is unable to understand the meaning, it is a slight misdeed.

original: khyams dang sgo phugs la sogs pa gnas gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa spyir bsdoms pa la tshig drug pa las lhag pa nyes byas so //

translated: If one teaches in other places, such as the courtyard, the door, the inner room, and so on, and one exceeds six words, it is a wrong action.

original: sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i chos las slob dpon la sogs pas btus pa dang / snyan dngangs su sbyar ba la nyes byas so //🔽tshig drug pa la ma lhag pa dang rig pa'i gnas skyes pa med par ston pa la nyes byas so //

translated: If one teaches the Buddha's words and the Dharma taught by the Buddha's disciples, compiled by the master and so on, and composed in verse, it is a wrong action.🔽If one teaches without exceeding six words and without a scholar present, it is a wrong action.

original: tshig drug pa las ma lhag par 'du shes pa dang / yi gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
analyzed: tshig drug pa las ma lhag par 'du shes pa dang / yi gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
translated: If one teaches without exceeding six words and one has a scholar present, but one does not understand the meaning of the words, it is a wrong action.

original: rig pa'i skyes pa brda mi phrad pa dang / mi rung ba dang / gling gzhan nas skyes pa dang / 'gyur ba bsten pa dang / bud med dang / za ma ngang /
analyzed: rig pa'i skyes pa brda mi phrad pa dang / mi rung ba dang / gling gzhan nas skyes pa dang / 'gyur ba bsten pa dang / bud med dang / za ma ngang /
translated: If one teaches without exceeding six words and one has a scholar present, but the scholar does not understand the language, it is not suitable, or if the scholar is from another continent, or if the scholar is a woman, a neuter,

original: ma ning dang / mtshan gnyis pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: ma ning dang / mtshan gnyis pa la nyes byas so //
translated: a paṇḍaka, or a hermaphrodite, it is a wrong action.

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
translated: The downfall of the training related to the training is a minor offense.

original: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
translated: And there are that many applications of the application to whatever is the extent of the application.

original: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor yang nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor yang nyes byas te /
translated: The application of a minor offense is also a minor offense.

original: nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: It is a subtle minor offense.

original: ltung ba med pa ni bud med mkhas pas gong nas gong du dris pa gtan la dbab par byas pa dan /
analyzed: ltung ba med pa ni bud med mkhas pas gong nas gong du dris pa gtan la dbab par byas pa dan /
translated: There is no offense for a skilled woman who is questioned about higher and higher topics and who is determining them.

original: slob gnyer gsod par dang / kha ton zhu ba dang / dmigs kyis 'dri ba dang / dus khrims dbog pa dang / yon tan bshad pa dag byed pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: slob gnyer gsod par dang / kha ton zhu ba dang / dmigs kyis 'dri ba dang / dus khrims dbog pa dang / yon tan bshad pa dag byed pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for one who is teaching, reciting, asking about, or examining the topics, or for one who is explaining good qualities when bestowing the timely moral discipline.

original: gnas tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan du tshig drug pa las ma lhag par bstan pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: gnas tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan du tshig drug pa las ma lhag par bstan pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for teaching with no more than the six topics in different places.

original: lam dri ba la sogs pa la lam rgyus ston pa la sogs pa gzhan la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: lam dri ba la sogs pa la lam rgyus ston pa la sogs pa gzhan la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for others who are teaching the route when asked about the route, and so on.

original: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for a beginner, for one who is insane, for one whose mind is disturbed, or for one who is overwhelmed by pain.

original: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs @35b thams cad du ston pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs @35b thams cad du ston pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: The training is that a fully ordained monk should train in not relying on any of the aspects of the downfalls that would occur if he were to teach all the topics to all the people in all situations.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is as before.

original: ston pa'i ltung byed de lnga pa bshad zin te /
analyzed: ston pa'i ltung byed de lnga pa bshad zin te /
translated: The fifth downfall of a similar type has been explained.🔽The origin of the downfall of reciting together

original: // /'don pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rkyal phyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // /'don pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rkyal phyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The Bhagavān Buddha was staying in Śrāvastī, in the Jeta Grove, in the park of Anāthapiṇḍada.

original: de'i tshe na dge slong drug ste dag gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag dang tshig gis chos 'don par byed /
analyzed: de'i tshe na dge slong drug ste dag gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag dang tshig gis chos 'don par byed /
translated: At that time, six fully ordained monks were reciting the Dharma with words that were not fully ordained.

original: des kun dga' ra ba'i mthar sgra mthon pa'o dang / sgra chen po dang skye bo phal po che 'tshogs pa'i sga lta bu 'di lta ste dper na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don pa lta bu dang / rtsis mkhan rnams rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bur grags par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan te /
analyzed: des kun dga' ra ba'i mthar sgra mthon pa'o dang / sgra chen po dang skye bo phal po che 'tshogs pa'i sga lta bu 'di lta ste dper na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don pa lta bu dang / rtsis mkhan rnams rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bur grags par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan te /
translated: The Blessed One heard that the monks were making a great noise, a loud noise, like a great crowd of people, like the sound of a brahman's secret words, like the sound of accountants in an accounting office.

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras nas /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras nas /
translated: He asked the Venerable Ananda:

original: kun dga' pos ji ltar gyur ba rgya cher gsol to /
analyzed: kun dga' pos ji ltar gyur ba rgya cher gsol to /
translated: Ananda told him in detail what had happened.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la sge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la sge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
translated: Then the Blessed One, on this occasion, with this circumstance, gathered the community of monks and asked the monks:🔽 Monks, is it true that you are doing this?

original: drug ste dag la rmas nas /
analyzed: drug ste dag la rmas nas /
translated: They replied, Yes, Blessed One.

original: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /🔽rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa / rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
translated: The Blessed One said, This is not the way of a monk,🔽it is not suitable,

original: rung ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa /
translated: it is not proper,🔽it is not in accord with the Dharma,

original: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
translated: it is not in accord with the monastic code,🔽it is not to be done by a monastic.

original: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar smad de /
analyzed: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar smad de /
translated: It is not something that should be done by those who have gone forth.

original: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
analyzed: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
translated: Having seen the ten benefits of establishing the training rules,

original: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
analyzed: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
translated: my disciples should recite this basis of training in the Monastic Law:

original: yang dge slong gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / tshig gis chos 'don na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dge slong gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / tshig gis chos 'don na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: ‘If a monk recites the Dharma in words with someone who has not completed the same training, he commits an offense requiring confession.’”

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The location is Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni drug ste /
analyzed: gang zag ni drug ste /
translated: The individuals are six.

original: nyon mongs pa ni ma zhi ba /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni ma zhi ba /
translated: The affliction is any of the three.

original: nyes pa ni gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / tshig gis chos 'don pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / tshig gis chos 'don pa'o //
translated: The offense is reciting the Dharma in words with someone who has not completed the same training.

original: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /🔽gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am / gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: Here, “monk” refers to the group of six or any other monk.🔽“Someone who has not completed the same training” means someone who has not completed the same training as the one reciting the Dharma.

original: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang zhes bya ba la bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang zhes bya ba la bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of those who have completed the same training:

original: dge slong dang dge slong ma'o //
analyzed: dge slong dang dge slong ma'o //
translated: bhikṣus and bhikṣuṇīs.

original: de las gzhan pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o //🔽tshig gis zhes bya ba ni tshig mnyam pa dang / tshig snga ba dang yi ge mnyam @36a * //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o // tshig gis zhes bya ba ni tshig mnyam pa dang / tshig snga ba dang yi ge mnyam @36a * //
translated: The other is one who is not fully ordained.

original: pa dang yi ge snga bas so //
analyzed: pa dang yi ge snga bas so //
translated: By means of words means by means of equal words, by means of prior words, by means of equal letters and by means of prior letters.

original: ji ltar tshig mnyam pas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar tshig mnyam pas she na /
translated: How is it by means of equal words?

original: slob dpon 'di skad ces sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes 'don pa na nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes 'don pa ste /
analyzed: slob dpon 'di skad ces sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes 'don pa na nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes 'don pa ste /
translated: When the preceptor recites, “One should not commit any evil,” the disciple recites, “One should not commit any evil” at the same time.

original: de ltar tshig mnyam pas so //
analyzed: de ltar tshig mnyam pas so //
translated: Thus it is by means of equal words.

original: ji ltar tshig snga bas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar tshig snga bas she na /
translated: How is it by means of prior words?

original: slob dpon gyis re zhig sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes ma bton par nye gnas dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya zhes 'don pa ste /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis re zhig sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes ma bton par nye gnas dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya zhes 'don pa ste /
translated: When the preceptor has not yet recited, “One should not commit any evil,” the disciple recites, “One should perfect virtue.”

original: de ltar tshig snga bas so //
analyzed: de ltar tshig snga bas so //
translated: Thus it is by means of prior words.

original: ji ltar yi ge mnyam pas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar yi ge mnyam pas she na /
translated: How is it by means of equal letters?

original: slob dpon aa zhes 'don pa na nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu aa zhes 'don pa ste /
analyzed: slob dpon aa zhes 'don pa na nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu aa zhes 'don pa ste /
translated: When the preceptor recites “a,” the disciple recites “a” at the same time.

original: de ltar yi ge mnyam pas so //
analyzed: de ltar yi ge mnyam pas so //
translated: Thus it is by means of equal letters.

original: ji ltar yi ge snga bas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar yi ge snga bas she na /
translated: How is it that the letter is prior?

original: slob dpon gyis re zhig / aa zhes ma bton par nye gnas aa zhes 'don pa ste /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis re zhig / aa zhes ma bton par nye gnas aa zhes 'don pa ste /
translated: The Master says: First the teacher says “a,” and then the student says “a.”

original: de ltar yi ge snga bas so //
analyzed: de ltar yi ge snga bas so //
translated: Thus, it is because the letter is prior.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
translated: “Dharma” means that which is spoken by the Buddha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
translated: or that which is explained by the Buddha’s śrāvakas.

original: 'don na zhes bya ba ni 'dzin du 'dzud na'o //
analyzed: 'don na zhes bya ba ni 'dzin du 'dzud na'o //
translated: “Recites” means that he makes him memorize.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “Offense” means as before.

original: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Here, how does one come to offend?

original: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, one should understand the characteristics of the offense, the non-offense, the training, and the amendment through the basic situation, the preparation, the preparation of the preparation, and so on.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / cig car ram de'i mjug thogs su de'i lung gi chos sam yi ge klag pa'i phyir 'don na 'don pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / cig car ram de'i mjug thogs su de'i lung gi chos sam yi ge klag pa'i phyir 'don na 'don pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the actual downfall is defined as follows: If a fully ordained monk recites the scriptures or the letters of the Dharma simultaneously with or immediately after a person who is not fully ordained in order to teach him the Dharma, he commits the actual downfall of reciting.

original: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa chos 'di pa'i rab tu byung ba dang lta ba dang mtshan mthun pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa chos 'di pa'i rab tu byung ba dang lta ba dang mtshan mthun pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: If the person who is not fully ordained is a Buddhist renunciate who shares the same view and the same discipline, there is no fault.

original: cig car ram de'i mjug thogs su dge slong gis 'don pa la na smad pa med do //🔽lung gi chos sangs rgyas sam /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan thos kyis gsungs pa ming dang tshig gi bdag nyid la na smad pa med do //🔽lung gi yi ge sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: cig car ram de'i mjug thogs su dge slong gis 'don pa la na smad pa med do // lung gi chos sangs rgyas sam / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan thos kyis gsungs pa ming dang tshig gi bdag nyid la na smad pa med do // lung gi yi ge sangs rgyas sam /
translated: If the monk recites simultaneously with or immediately after the other person, there is no fault.🔽If the Dharma that is being recited is the Buddha's teaching or the teachings of the Buddha's disciples, there is no fault if the monk recites the names and phrases.

original: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis gsungs pa aa a'a ai a'i la sogs pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis gsungs pa aa a'a ai a'i la sogs pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: If the letters of the Dharma that is being recited are the Buddha's teaching or the teachings of the Buddha's disciples, there is no fault if the monk recites the letters such as a, ā, i, ī, and so forth.

original: lung nod pa'i bsam pas klag pa'i phyir 'don pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: lung nod pa'i bsam pas klag pa'i phyir 'don pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no downfall if you recite the scriptures with the attitude of receiving oral transmission.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni gang zag @36b bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lung gi chos dang yi ge'o //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni gang zag @36b bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lung gi chos dang yi ge'o //
translated: The agent is an individual who has not yet received full ordination, and the object is the transmitted Dharma or its words.

original: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: There are ten factors that make this downfall complete:🔽An individual who has not yet received full ordination,

original: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / lung gi chos sam yi ge dang / cig car ram /
analyzed: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / lung gi chos sam yi ge dang / cig car ram /
translated: The transmitted Dharma or its words,🔽Simultaneously,🔽Immediately after,🔽For the purpose of recitation,

original: de'i mjug thogs dang / klag pa'i ched dang / 'don pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mjug thogs dang / klag pa'i ched dang / 'don pa'o //
translated: And recitation.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these factors is missing, there is a corresponding reduction in the offense.

original: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
translated: The downfall is a serious violation.

original: ji srid du 'don pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du 'don pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
translated: As long as you have not reached the point of reciting the words of the transmitted Dharma, you have committed a serious violation.

original: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
translated: For each time you recite a different part of the transmitted Dharma, you have committed a serious violation.

original: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lta ba dang / mtshan mi mthun pa dang / khyim pa'i rtags can dang / phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba la nyes byas so //
analyzed: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lta ba dang / mtshan mi mthun pa dang / khyim pa'i rtags can dang / phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba la nyes byas so //
translated: If the person is not fully ordained, or has a different view, or has a different gender, or has the marks of a layperson, or is a renunciate of another religion, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: dge slong gis bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa las lung nod cing de dang cig car ram ma mjug thogs su 'don pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: dge slong gis bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa las lung nod cing de dang cig car ram ma mjug thogs su 'don pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If a fully ordained monk receives oral transmission from someone who is not fully ordained, and recites it at the same time or immediately after, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: lung du gtogs pa nyid ma yin pa lung las btus pa'i chos dper na chos thams cad bdag med do //
analyzed: lung du gtogs pa nyid ma yin pa lung las btus pa'i chos dper na chos thams cad bdag med do //
translated: If it is not part of the scriptures, but is a teaching extracted from the scriptures, such as “All phenomena are selfless,”

original: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu dang / lung gi don las btus shing lung gi yi ge med pa ming dang tshig dang yi ge gzhan gyi bye brag dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu dang / lung gi don las btus shing lung gi yi ge med pa ming dang tshig dang yi ge gzhan gyi bye brag dang ldan pa /
translated: “All conditioned things are momentary,” and so forth, and if it is extracted from the meaning of the scriptures, but does not have the words of the scriptures, and has a different set of names, phrases, and letters,

original: dper na slob dpon dpa' bos byas pa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud la sogs pa lta bu la nyes byas so //
analyzed: dper na slob dpon dpa' bos byas pa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud la sogs pa lta bu la nyes byas so //
translated: such as the Jātakamālā composed by Ācārya Āryaśūra, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: yi ge zhes bya ba ni yi ge'i 'bru'o //
analyzed: yi ge zhes bya ba ni yi ge'i 'bru'o //
translated: “Letters” means the written letters.

original: ming zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o /
analyzed: ming zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o /
translated: Name is, for example, the names of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha.

original: tshig ces bya ba ni dper na /
analyzed: tshig ces bya ba ni dper na /
translated: Phrase is, for example,

original: bsod nams dag gi rnam smin bde//
analyzed: bsod nams dag gi rnam smin bde//
translated: The ripening of merit is happiness.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Word is, for example,🔽the word merit.

original: de dag kyang lung du gtogs pa nyid yin na dngos gzhi'o //🔽lung las btus na nyes byas so //
analyzed: de dag kyang lung du gtogs pa nyid yin na dngos gzhi'o // lung las btus na nyes byas so //
translated: If those are included in the scriptures, it is a root downfall.🔽If one extracts them from the scriptures, it is a minor offense.

original: lung nod cing klag pa'i phyir ma yin par 'don pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: lung nod cing klag pa'i phyir ma yin par 'don pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If one recites without reciting or reading the scriptures, it is a minor offense.

original: 'don pa ma rdzogs na nyes byas so //🔽mi ma yin pa la nyes byas na smad do //
analyzed: 'don pa ma rdzogs na nyes byas so // mi ma yin pa la nyes byas na smad do //
translated: If one does not complete the recitation, it is a minor offense.🔽If one recites to a non-human, it is a minor offense.

original: dud 'grol nyes byas te de bas kyang na smad do //
analyzed: dud 'grol nyes byas te de bas kyang na smad do //
translated: If one recites to an animal, it is a minor offense.

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
translated: The downfall of preparation is a minor offense.

original: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
translated: As many preparations as there are, there are also that many preparations of preparations.

original: sbyor ba nyes byas kyis sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba nyes byas kyis sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
translated: The preparation of a preparation is also a minor offense.

original: nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: It is a minor offense.

original: ltung ba med pa ni mi 'dod bzhin du grub pa la ltung @37a * //
analyzed: ltung ba med pa ni mi 'dod bzhin du grub pa la ltung @37a * //
translated: There is no offense if one is unable to do so because of not wanting to.🔽
